definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Ec 12:11 nail (connexion with above √ dub.; Targum [[מַסְמְרָא]], ChrPalAram. msmry0 Schwally:63. 122; NH vb. [[סמר]] nail on or up; Ar. misma0run is perh. loan-word Frä:89);—pl. abs. [[מַסְמְרִים]] Is 41:7, [[מִסְמְרִים]] 1Ch 22:3 (of iron; on [[]]—[[ִ]] v. Ges:§ 85 f.); also [[מַסְמְרוֹת]] Je 10:4 (+ [[מַקָּבוֹת]]), [[מַשְׂמְרוֹת נְטוּעִים]], Ec Ec 12:11(sim.; + [[דָּרְבׂנוֹת]]), and [[מִסְמְרוֹת]] 2Ch 3:9 (of gold).
